thread.title: Butch Trucks’ Death Ruled A Suicide
thread.title_full: Butch Trucks’ Death Ruled A Suicide

author: Peter Helman
title: Butch Trucks’ Death Ruled A Suicide
text:
Peter Helman @_peterhelman | January 26, 2017 - 8:51   
Yesterday, it was reported that Butch Trucks, drummer and founding member of the Allman Brothers Band, had died at age 69. Now, The Miami Herald is reporting that police have officially ruled his death a suicide. According to police records, Trucks’ wife called the West Palm Beach Police Department at around 6PM on Tuesday after Trucks shot himself in their shared condo. 
If you or anyone you know is considering suicide, is feeling depressed, or just needs to talk, the number for the National Suicide Prevention Lifeline is 1-800-273-8255.
